results.title: Protective effect of simvastatin on arterial plaque instability induced by p-cresyl sulfate.
results.text_hl: All @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were randomly divided into three groups: 1) the control group, 2) the @<m>DISEASE_Mucopolysaccharidosis_Type_VIII</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563094 @@@PCS@@@ group and 3) the @<m>DISEASE_Mucopolysaccharidosis_Type_VIII</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563094 @@@PCS@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Li HY, Liu F, Gao C, Wang HR. Protective effect of simvastatin on arterial plaque instability induced by p-cresyl sulfate. Eur Rev Med Pharmacol Sci. 2018 Sep;22(18):6149-6155. PMID: 30280803
